data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Provides an OO Handle to a class. Provides a unifying OO wrapper to
    UNIVERSAL, Class::ISA, and Class::Inspector, as well as additional
    methods doing actions of varying types ( well ->load currently ).

    Makes life a bit easier for some sorts of programs that like to
    manipulate and examine their classes.
